message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. While $18,000 reflects the true value, I'm willing to come down to $15,000. This is my best offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $15,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,500.
